Merge pull request #10 from cenedella/master

"It's not about me, it's about you"

"It's not about me, it's about you"

I was asked to add these questions to this list: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=6705559

I am the author of America's largest career advice newsletter: 
bit.ly/TheLaddersNewsletter2014

The specific newsletter from which these questions are taken is my twice-a-year update on the best questions to ask in an interview, and can be found here: 
http://www.theladders.com/career-newsletters/it-s-not-about-me--it-s-about-you----the-20-questions-you-need-to-ask-in-a-job-interview-June-2013
